remarks:
2011-Mar-17 15:30:24 by gthain:
I'm not sure this is right: 

commit f8e93883dce4deb447e350ab06ef0a01e81c5d1f
Author: Dan Bradley <dan@hep.wisc.edu>
Date:   Wed Apr 14 11:14:24 2010 -0500

    Fixed startd crash when using STARTD_SENDS_ALIVES. #1349

diff --git a/src/condor_startd.V6/claim.cpp b/src/condor_startd.V6/claim.cpp
index 50fc86d..5198a8c 100644
--- a/src/condor_startd.V6/claim.cpp
+++ b/src/condor_startd.V6/claim.cpp
@@ -1041,6 +1041,7 @@ Claim::sendAliveResponseHandler( Stream *sock )
                dprintf(D_FAILURE|D_ALWAYS,"State change: claim no longer recognized "
                         "by the schedd - removing claim\n" );
                finishKillClaim();      // get rid of the claim
+               c_alive_inprogress_sock = NULL;
                return FALSE;
        }
